text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/0afdcf8601792ee751984265b49fc2ca6f8ea858|patch 8.2.0490: Win32: VTP doesn't respect 'restorescreen'>
patch 8.2.0490: Win32: VTP doesn't respect 'restorescreen'

Problem:    Win32: VTP doesn't respect 'restorescreen'.
Solution:   Use escape codes to switch to alternate screen. (Nobuhiro
            Takasaki, closes #5872)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.0490: Win32: VTP doesn't respect 'restorescreen' · vim/vim@0afdcf8
attachments.title: patch 8.2.0490: Win32: VTP doesn't respect 'restorescreen' · vim/vim@0afdcf8
attachments.text: Problem: Win32: VTP doesn't respect 'restorescreen'. Solution: Use escape codes to switch to alternate screen. (Nobuhiro Takasaki, closes #5872)
